doc.title: Voice of Nankai
doc.snippet: In the afternoon of February 26th, Prof. Dai Zigao, Vice President of the Chinese Astronomical Society, Professor and Doctoral Supervisor at Nanjing University’s School of Astronomy & Space Science and Professor of the Yangtze River Scholars Program, was invited to give an academic report at Nankai University’s Physics Today Series Lectures. The title of the lecture was Gamma Ray Burst: the Brightest Firework the Universe gave to Human Beings. Nearly 200 professors and students participated in the event.
